title: WHIG Reveals Marketing-Based Crisis Exploitation Strategy
summary: Andrew Card states "From a marketing point of view, you dont introduce new products in August" when explaining White House Iraq Group (WHIG) strategy timing for Iraq War campaign. Statement reveals systematic application of Powell Memo principles of coordinated messaging and crisis timing. WHIG demonstrates transformation of Powell's 50-year gradual capture strategy into rapid crisis-driven implementation model.
